query: 如图所示,在▱ABCD中,CE是∠DCB的平分线,且交AB于E,DB与CE相交于O,已知AB=6,BC=4,则\frac{OB}{DB}等于()选项：['\\frac{1}{3}', '\\frac{2}{5}', '\\frac{3}{7}', '\\frac{2}{3}']
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD为平行四边形,∴CD∥AB=6,∵∠1=∠2,∵CE是∠DCB的平分线,即∠1=∠3,∴∠2=∠3,∴BE=BC=4,∵BE∥CD,∴△BEO∽△DCO,∴\frac{OB}{OD}=\frac{BE}{CD}=\frac{4}{6}=\frac{2}{3},∴\frac{BO}{BO+DO}=\frac{2}{3+2}=\frac{2}{5},即\frac{BO}{DB}=\frac{2}{5}．故选:B．
